reviewText: Requires significant chart reading skills, which I do not have. Sometimes the instructor uses more time explaining charts so at least I can figure out what I need to figure out. I may go back to this when I have more time and study it, but I prefer DVDs that I can pop in and take right out of the box and start using right away. This is not that. It is advanced. I am an intermediate guy with marginal Afro-Cuban experience and it was way way over my head. Just an FYI. I'm sure it's awesome for the right drummer.
